message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
I'm willing to be more reasonable than your initial offer, Alice, but I need a larger share to account for the rapid inflation affecting me. This is a fair offer.
Bob, inflation is hitting you harder than me. This is the best offer you'll get - take it before it shrinks further!
Alice, it's clear we both want a larger share, but this back and forth is only hurting us both due to inflation.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
